body:
#### PR description:

After the PR #28796  was merged, it's necessary update the Scenario2026D49 adding the new Specs File modified for GEM (this file is also necessary to start debugging the code for the DD4HEP migration for ME0) 
 

#### PR validation:

No Overlaps for Muon System (by cmsShow)
title: Update GEMSpecs for Scenario2026D49
